title: ChatGPT Premium Unlocked: Tools and Techniques for Business Excellence
description: Offers a detailed exploration of tools available in the ChatGPT premium seat, focusing on advanced features like execution flows and custom instructions.
Incorporates interactive workshops and real-world business case studies to enhance practical relevance.
Emphasizes ethical AI practices, with examples linked directly to business implications.
Suggests scaffolding steps, such as a mini project or simulation exercise, to ease the transition from tool exploration to practical application.
Maps workshop segments to specific business outcomes, like increased operational efficiency, to measure learning impact.
